actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-850.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6362 to establish an Advisory Committee on Timber Sales Procedure appointed by the Secretary of Agriculture for the purposes of studying, and making recommendations with respect to, procedures by which timber is sold by the Forest Service, and to restore stability to the Forest Service timber sales program and provide an opportunity for congressional review.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 6362 (Timber Sales Procedure Advisory Committee).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6362 to establish an Advisory Committee on Timber Sales Procedure appointed by the Secretary of Agriculture for the purposes of studying, and making recommendations with respect to, procedures by which timber is sold by the Forest Service, and to restore stability to the Forest Service timber sales program and provide an opportunity for congressional review.
